from zeppelin_session import ZeppelinSession, resetZeppelinSession, LogLevel, Logger

zs = ZeppelinSession(z.z)

Initialize NVD3
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from zeppelin_viz.nvd3 import Nvd3
from zeppelin_viz.nvd3.nvd3_chart import Nvd3Chart
from zeppelin_viz.nvd3.nvd3_data import Nvd3Data

nv = Nvd3()

paragraphs.title: Recommend to load NVD3 1.8.5 (this might break some %sql functionality)

msg.data:
1 Included Charts

1.1 Box Plot Chart

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

a = randomNormalList(100, 10, 5)
b = randomNormalList(100,  5, 2)
c = randomNormalList(100,  3, 1)
d = randomNormalList(100,  7, 1)
e = randomNormalList(100,  9, 4)
bp_df = pd.DataFrame([a,b,c,d,e]).T
bp_df.columns = ["Series A", "Series B", "Series C", "Series D", "Series E"]
bp_df.describe()
paragraphs.title: Test Data

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark


x = np.linspace(0, 4*np.pi, 100)

# l_df = pd.DataFrame({"X":x*100, "Sin":np.sin(x), "Cos":np.cos(x), "ArcTan":np.arctan(x-2*np.pi)/3})
l_df = pd.DataFrame({"X":lastDays(100, epoch=True, ms=False),"Sin":np.sin(x), "Cos":np.cos(x), "ArcTan":np.arctan(x-2*np.pi)/3})


l1 = nv.lineChart()

config={"focusEnable": False, "color":nv.c20b()[10:13], "height":500,
        "area":[True, False, True], "fillOpacity":[0.2, 0, 0.2], "style":["dashed", "dotted", None]}
l1.plot(l1.convert(l_df[:70], "X", ["Sin", "Cos", "ArcTan"], config=config))

%pyspark
import time

for i in range(71,100):
    time.sleep(0.1)
    l1.append(l1.convert(l_df[i:i+1], "X", ["Sin", "Cos", "ArcTan"]))

%pyspark

l2 = nv.lineChart()

config={"focusEnable": True, "color":nv.c10()[0:3], "height": 540,
        "area":[True, False, True], "fillOpacity":[0.2, 0, 0.2], "style":["dashed", "dotted", None]}
l2.plot(l2.convert(l_df, "X", ["Sin", "Cos", "ArcTan"], config=config))

%pyspark

db_df = pd.DataFrame(bp_df.mean()).reset_index()
db_df.columns = ["Series", "Mean"]

db = nv.discreteBarChart()

config={"height": 350, "width": 500, "color": nv.c20()}
db.plot(db.convert(db_df, group="Series", series="Mean", config=config))

%pyspark
x = np.linspace(0, 4*np.pi, 10)
mb_df = pd.DataFrame({"X":x, "Sin":np.sin(x), "Cos":np.cos(x), "ArcTan":np.arctan(x-2*np.pi)/3})

mb = nv.multiBarChart()

config = {"height":500, "width": 800, "color":nv.c20()}
mb.plot(mb.convert(mb_df[:6], "X", ["Sin", "Cos", "ArcTan"], config=config))

%pyspark

for i in range(6,10):
    time.sleep(0.5)
    mb.append(mb.convert(mb_df[i:i+1], "X", ["Sin", "Cos", "ArcTan"]))

%pyspark
count = 100
quantity = randomWalk(100, 6, 1, 250)
price = randomWalk(100, 1, 4, 20)
date = lastDays(100)

lpb_df = pd.DataFrame({"Date":date, "Quantity":quantity, "Price":price})

lpb = nv.linePlusBarChart()

config={"color":nv.c10(), "height":400}
lpb.plot(lpb.convert(lpb_df, "Date", lineCol="Price", barCol="Quantity", config=config))

%pyspark

p1 = nv.pieChart()

config={"donut": False, "color": nv.c10()}
p1.plot(p1.convert(db_df, "Series", "Mean", config=config))

%pyspark

p2 = nv.pieChart()

config={"donut": True, "color": nv.c20(), "height":300}
p2.plot(p2.convert(db_df, "Series", "Mean", config=config))

%pyspark

p3 = nv.pieChart()

config={"halfPie": True, "donut": True, "color": nv.grey()[5:16:2], "height":600}
p3.plot(p3.convert(db_df, "Series", "Mean", config=config))

%pyspark
import time
from datetime import datetime

count = 100
groups = 5

series = []
for i in range(groups):
    factor = np.random.randint(5,10)
    offset = np.random.randint(20,100)
    series.append(randomWalk(count, factor, factor, offset).tolist())

sa_df = pd.DataFrame([lastDays(count, epoch=True)] + series).T
sa_df.columns = ["Date"] + ["Series %d" % i  for i in range(groups)]


sa = nv.stackedAreaChart()

config={"color": nv.c20(), "height":300}
sa.plot(sa.convert(sa_df, "Date", ["Series %d" % i for i in range(groups)], config=config))

%pyspark

import random

groups = 4
points = 20
shapeTypes = ['circle', 'cross', 'triangle-up', 'triangle-down', 'diamond', 'square']

spl_df = []

for i in range(groups):
    spl_df.append(pd.DataFrame({"X%d"%i: randomNormalList(points, 0, 1), 
                                "Y%d"%i: randomNormalList(points, 0, 1),
                                "Size%d"%i: randomList(points, 0.5, 0.25), 
                                "Shape%d"%i: shapeTypes[i] if i > 0 else [shapeTypes[random.randint(0, len(shapeTypes)-1)] for r in range(points)]
                               }))
                            
keys =       ["X%d"%i     for i in range(groups)]
values =     ["Y%d"%i     for i in range(groups)]
shapes =     ["Shape%d"%i for i in range(groups)]
sizes =      ["Size%d"%i  for i in range(groups)]
slopes =     [0.9, None, -1, None]
intercepts = [-1, None, 1, None]

spl = nv.scatterPlusLineChart()

config={"height": 600, "color":nv.c10(),
        "xDomain":[-3,3], "slope":slopes, "intercept":intercepts}
spl.plot(spl.convert(spl_df, key=keys, value=values, shape=shapes, size=sizes, config = config))
